AddressId.description: The ID of the updated Address object.

Description.description: The updated description of this job's JobMetadata object.

JobId.description: The job ID of the job that you want to update, for example JID123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000.

Notification.description: The new or updated Notification object.

Resources.description: The updated S3Resource object (for a single Amazon S3 bucket or key range), or the updated JobResource object (for multiple buckets or key ranges).

RoleARN.description: The new role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that you want to associate with this job. To create a role ARN, use the CreateRole AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) API action.

ShippingOption.description: The updated shipping option value of this job's ShippingDetails object.

SnowballCapacityPreference.description: The updated SnowballCapacityPreference of this job's JobMetadata object. The 50 TB Snowballs are only available in the US regions.
